markdownContent:
**The scenario:** You're a graduate student, trying to finish your Master's thesis. Your supervisor, Professor Witles, has approved your provisional title, “Transgressive Women, Transnational Work”. You made it deliberately broad, to give yourself the maximum leeway to develop a more focused research question. But now, several months into your so-called “research phase”, you are no closer to finding an actual topic. To make things worse, Professor Witles believes that you are in the final stages of writing up. But you are not.

Part of the problem is that you can’t concentrate so well on your academic work because of your financial constraints. These stem from...
